propsTable.title: Search Props
propsTable.description: List of all properties supported by the Search component.

rows.description: Aria label for accessibility. Provides additional context for screen readers.
Defines the color of the search bar. Options are: 'primary', 'secondary', 'success', 'warning', 'danger'.
Inline styles to be applied to the search bar.
Defines the size of the search bar. Options are: 'sm', 'md', 'lg'.
Defines the border-radius of the search bar. Options are: 'none', 'sm', 'md', 'lg', 'full'.
Defines the border width of the search bar. Options are: 'none', 'default', 'bottom'.
Determines the position of the label. Options are: 'outside.start', 'outside-end', 'inside-start' and 'inside-end'.
Additional CSS class names to apply.
Changes the value of the search bar for different operations.
Adds placeholder text to the search bar.

rows.type: Triggered when the button is clicked.

accessibility.description: Accessibility considerations for the Search bar component.

ariaRoles.description: The Search component is rendered with the search role by default.
